planets.name: Mercury
planets.god: Mercury (Roman) - god of merchants, travelers, and messages
planets.funFact: Mercury has no moons and it's the smallest planet in the solar system.

planets.name: Venus
planets.god: Venus (Roman) - goddess of love and beauty
planets.funFact: Venus rotates in the opposite direction to most planets, including Earth.

planets.name: Earth
planets.funFact: Earth is the only known planet to support life.

planets.name: Mars
planets.funFact: Mars is often called the 'Red Planet' because of its reddish appearance.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.funFact: Jupiter has the strongest magnetic field of all the planets.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.god: Saturn (Roman) - god of agriculture and wealth
planets.funFact: Saturn has a prominent ring system composed primarily of ice particles.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.funFact: Uranus rotates on its side, making it unique among the solar system planets.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.funFact: Neptune has the fastest winds in the solar system, reaching speeds up to 2,100 km/h.
